reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sleeve cover up works well with sleeveless dresses and suits, and appreciate its comfort, noting it's not scratchy. Customers consider the product pricey.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!
items.body: I LOVE THIS GARMENT! It works perfectly! Worth the money , good quality and workmanship. Love the blue one, can’t wait to get the black one. It covers my old wrinkly arms( stretch marks) . Fits great, STAYS IN PLACE! Comfortable in the under arms too! Read more
items.author: Ruth L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A True White
items.body: Sized correctly, a small fits a size 6-8. 3/4 sleeve and excellent quality with nice stretch. Easy to put on. This is my second one. I also have it in black and have worn it for several years. love the V neck! Read more
items.author: P Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Double your wardrobe!
items.body: Had a beautiful sleeveless sweater dress, but snow was in the forecast. This item was perfect and so many people complimented the dress. I told everyone it was 2 pieces. My daughter also wore one under a sleeveless sequin dress. These sleeves are comfortable, worth the value and run true to size. Highly recommended! Read more
items.author: Anthony A. Sierchio

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous and versatile but too large and stretchy.
items.body: I can't rave enough how much I love this product. It is nearly seamless under virtually any top or dress. My qualms are that I have to reorder them so often because they fray easily and they stretch out without any bounce back. You'd expect much better quality for the price. Also they run super large and have a lot of stretch. If you're normally a medium, buy a small. Other than that, I'm buying two of every color! Read more
items.author: Siren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instantly Transforms Sleeveless Dress To Provide Coverage!
items.body: If you want to wear stylish sleeveless dresses but don’t feel comfoexposing your upper arms, then this is the so,union you have been waiting for! You simply put this on, with snap closure in front if you want an open neckline or the snap in the back if you want coverage in the cleavage area, and put the dress on top. Instantly transforms the dress, but the best part is that it doesn’t look like two pieces. It looks like the sleeves are an intentional part of the dress! Can also wear under a sleeveless top for the same effect. I’ve been wearing these for over 12 years but wanted a 3/4 length for warmer months. Amazon has the best prices in this brand and free shipping. Black and white are a must for everyone’s wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Kimber PDX

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves
items.body: Love this!!!! Medium fit perfectly Read more
items.author: Me

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Was perfect with my dress. No seams showing and comfortable Read more
items.author: L. Turner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sheer covering blouse.
items.body: Love it. Easy to use. Read more
items.author: Wajihah Chaudhary

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
